item.title: ~ Needing Help With Jail Command ~
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Realm Blood Realm
item.description:
@Blood_Realm wrote:

You think you could just make this Buffer for me just so it keeps the teleblock at true when you log out only when you are jailed, and unjail so it sets teleblock to false. I can see then what it does.

Read full topic

item.title: ~ Needing Help With Jail Command ~
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

You would have to add it to the command. The BufferedWriter has great methods, and they can be used to write things into files. You can also create files with it, then write in them. The BufferedReader reads through a txt file and you can use a loop to read the lines until you find something. If you don’t, do whatever. If you do, do whatever. You can check if the line you read is null in the loop, if it is then that means that there are no more lines. This can all be done with these two classes. Very useful, I’d say. Allows the user to “save the game”.

Read full topic

item.title: ~ Needing Help With Jail Command ~
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Use a BufferedWriter and BufferedReader.

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/BufferedWriter.html & http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/BufferedReader.html

Read full topic

item.title: ~ Needing Help With Jail Command ~
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Realm Blood Realm
item.description:
@Blood_Realm wrote:

Alright, I am needing a little bit of help with this command, nothing too much as it works fine, it’s just that everytime I send a player to jail it teleblocks them, but if they log out and back in, they can get out of it. I need to know a little script to stop them from teleblocking even when the log out but if they are in jail only, so when I ::unjail them the teleblock goes. Thank you so much, here’s the jail script I have:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 2) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //Made by Blood Realm } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2451; c.teleportToY = 4938; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been sent to Jail by an Administrator!"); c.sendMessage("An Administrator will release you shortly."); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3228; c.teleportToY = 3408; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("You have been released from Jail, please be good."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

If anyone can help me with this I will very much appreciate it, cheers.

Read full topic
